competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll processor for small business

competitors.name: Intuit Payroll
competitors.notes: Small business payroll from QuickBooks maker

context: In 2000, Paycom was founded (as Paycom Payroll) in Oklahoma City by Chad Richison. The payroll market was dominated by ADP and Paychex service bureaus. Web-based payroll was emerging but most processing was outsourced to service bureaus. The HR software market was separate from payroll processing. Paycom started as regional payroll processor building toward integrated HCM platform.
